text: Federica Cesarini (born 2 August 1996) is an Italian lightweight rower world champion at senior level at the World Rowing Championships. ==Biography== Maregotto started the activity in 2009, having her senior debut in 2017. In addition to the international medals won at a senior level, at the youth level she won six more medals. ==Achievements== {| class="wikitable" width=55% style="font-size:90%; text-align:center;" |- !Year !!Competition !!Venue !!Rank!!Event!!Time |- |rowspan=1|2017 |align=left|World Championships |align=left| Sarasota |bgcolor=gold|1st |Lightweight quadruple sculls |6:33.97 |} ==References== ==External links== * Category:1996 births Category:Living people Category:Italian female rowers Category:World Rowing Championships medalists for Italy Category:Rowers of Fiamme Oro
title: Federica Cesarini
